name: Light of Judgment
desc: If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, you can activate this card by discarding 1 LIGHT monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Choose 1 card your opponent controls or 1 in their hand (you can look at their hand), and send it to the Graveyard.
str1: Choose 1 card your opponent controls and send it to the Graveyard
str2: Choose 1 card in your opponent's hand and send it to the Graveyard
